chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Union A (Union A P Q) R) (Union A P (Union A Q R))

Premises:
Fin.R : forall n : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n + ?m) where ?m : [ |- nat]
Ensemble = fun U : Type => U -> Prop : Type -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
Record Q : Set := Qmake { Qnum : BinNums.Z; Qden : BinNums.positive } For Qmake: Argument scopes are [Z_scope positive_scope]
Same_set = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) => Included B C /\ Included C B : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop Argument U is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
Union : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Ensemble U
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For A: Arguments TA
Union_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Union A P Q) (Union A Q P)
Intersection_assoc : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Intersection A P Q) R) (Intersection A P (Intersection A Q R))
Intersection_Complement : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Complement A P) (Complement A Q)) (Complement A (Union A P Q))
Intersection_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A P Q) (Intersection A Q P)
Same_set_spec : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set P Q < -> pointwise_relation A iff P Q
Union_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (P Q : Ensemble A), Union A P Q v < -> P v \/ Q v
Intersection_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (P Q : Ensemble A), Intersection A P Q v < -> P v /\ Q v
Disjoint_spec : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Disjoint A P Q < -> (forall x : A, P x -> Q x -> False)
Union_iff : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U) (x : U), In U (Union U A B) x < -> In U A x \/ In U B x
Extensionality_Ensembles : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U), Same_set A B -> A = B
List.Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> List.Forall P l -> List.Forall P (x :: l)
List.Forall_nil : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), List.Forall P nil
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)%list) -> forall l : list A, P l
Union_intror : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U), In U C x -> In U (Union U B C) x
Union_introl : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U), In U B x -> In U (Union U B C) x
Union_inv : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U), In U (Union U B C) x -> In U B x \/ In U C x
Full_set_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A), Full_set A v < -> True
List.Forall2_nil : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop), List.Forall2 R nil nil
Inductive Forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Forall_nil : List.Forall P nil | Forall_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> List.Forall P l -> List.Forall P (x :: l) For Forall: Argument A is implicit For Forall_nil: Argument A is implicit For Forall_cons: Arguments A, P, l are implicit For Forall: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope list_scope] For Forall_nil: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Forall_cons: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ list_scope _ _]
Complement_Empty_set : forall A : Type, Same_set (Complement A (Empty_set A)) (Full_set A)
Same_set_rel_Symmetric = fun A : Type => Same_set_sym A : forall A : Type, Symmetric Same_set Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scope is [type_scope]
Same_set_rel_Transitive = fun A : Type => Same_set_trans A : forall A : Type, Transitive Same_set Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scope is [type_scope]
Same_set_rel_Reflexive = fun A : Type => Same_set_refl A : forall A : Type, Reflexive Same_set Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scope is [type_scope]
Included_Full_set : forall (A : Type) (P : Ensemble A), Included P (Full_set A)
Included_Empty : forall (U : Type) (A : Ensemble U), Included (Empty_set U) A
Add_intro1 : forall (U : Type) (A : Ensemble U) (x y : U), In U A y -> In U (Add U A x) y
Same_set_rel_relation = fun A : Type => {| |} : forall A : Type, RewriteRelation Same_set Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scope is [type_scope]
Decidable.not_and : forall A B : Prop, Decidable.decidable A -> ~ (A /\ B) -> ~ A \/ ~ B
Add_inv : forall (U : Type) (A : Ensemble U) (x y : U), In U (Add U A x) y -> In U A y \/ x = y
Inhabited_add : forall (U : Type) (A : Ensemble U) (x : U), Inhabited U (Add U A x)

```coq
intros A P Q R.
split.
- intros x Hx.
  rewrite Union_spec in Hx.
  destruct Hx as [Hp | Hq].
  + left.
    apply Union_introl.
    assumption.
  + right.
    apply Union_intror.
    assumption.
- intros x Hx.
  rewrite Union_spec.
  destruct Hx as [Hp | Hq].
  + left.
    apply Union_introl.
    assumption.
  + right.
    apply Union_intror.
    assumption.
Qed.```

original: intros A P Q R. split. - intros x Hx. rewrite Union_spec in Hx. destruct Hx as [Hp | Hq]. + left. apply Union_introl. auto. + right. apply Union_intror. auto. - intros x Hx. rewrite Union_spec. destruct Hx as [Hp | Hq]. + left. apply Union_introl. auto. + right. apply Union_intror. auto.
